price: 7. Kuwa gaalooba waxay moodaan inaan marnaba laga soo bixinaynin (iilka). Dheh: Haayoo! waa igu Rabbigaye, waa la idin soo bixin, markaas waxaa la idiin sheegi (oo la idinka jaazeyn) waxaad fasheen, (arrin)kaasina Alle wuu u fudud yahay.
arabic: زَعَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَن لَّن يُبۡعَثُواْۚ قُلۡ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّي لَتُبۡعَثُنَّ ثُمَّ لَتُنَبَّؤُنَّ بِمَا عَمِلۡتُمۡۚ وَذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: zaʿama alladhīna kafarū an lan yub'ʿathū qul balā warabbī latub'ʿathunna thumma latunabba-unna bimā ʿamil'tum wadhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
